div.p: Codes providing the status/availability of a specimen.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/specimen-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The physical specimen is present and in good condition.
There is no physical specimen because it is either lost, destroyed or consumed.
The specimen cannot be used because of a quality issue such as a broken container, contamination, or too old.
The specimen was entered in error and therefore nullified.

description.value: Codes providing the status/availability of a specimen.

definition.value: The physical specimen is present and in good condition.
There is no physical specimen because it is either lost, destroyed or consumed.
The specimen cannot be used because of a quality issue such as a broken container, contamination, or too old.
The specimen was entered in error and therefore nullified.
